hypothesis_content.title: Memecoin Volatility Compression Breakout Pattern
hypothesis_content.statement: When aggregate memecoin volatility (20-day rolling) compresses to 30% below its 90-day average during BULL regimes, a breakout above the compression band triggers 3-day momentum averaging +22% for the memecoin basket (PEPE/DOGE/TRUMP weighted), outperforming ETH (+12%) by 10 percentage points.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Bull regimes reward volatility expansion, especially in speculative assets. Memecoins exhibit explosive momentum after prolonged compression as pent-up speculative demand unleashes. Volume confirmation reduces false breakouts.
entry_conditions: Basket price breaks above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band on >1.5× average volume
BTC dominance 5-day change ≤ -0.5% (capital flowing to alts)
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain above compression band for 2 consecutive days, or memecoin volume declines despite price breakout.
